name: Diamond Hunter: The Rivals
description:
Actually this is my first game of all, i make this before i make the Cyberunner, and i make this game on Construct 2 game engine, yeah that's drag & drop based game engine.

So this game is so simple, just collect diamond as many as you can, dodge the enemy and his attacks, but also don't let the enemy get the diamond, and the longer you play, your enemy will be moving faster

For the controls, i recommend you to use mobile device to play, because the controls is using Virtual Joystick and some Buttons

You can also play the game from Here, or download the APK file to install & play offline
